Job Title & Description: HVAC Mechanical Technician.
CLIENT: QATAR GAS OPERATING COMPANY LTD (QATAR).
    


PTW,  JSA,  hazardous  area  classification  and



task.


work training by QATAR GAS operating company.


ME) Training by QATARGAS Operating Company LTD. 

Complete  Fire  watcher  &  Fire  Fighter training  by
QATAR GAS operating company.

Appointed  Person
 
 -  A  person  nominated  by  Qatar  gas
Operation  Department  writing  and  also  appointed  in
writing  by  the  Maintenance  Senior  Electrical  Engineer
Technical,  to  carry  out  specified  activities  which  may
include  limited  remote  switching  of  electrical  units.
Isolation  and  De-isolation  of  low  voltage  electrical
apparatus. Power control center (PPC) panel operator do
not need to become appointed person because operating
electrical  apparatus  from  the  panel  is  part  of  their  job
Description.

 
Isolation- 
Disconnected  from  live  apparatus  and
conductors  by an open disconnected or by an adequate
physical gap.





Able  to  work  on  different.  Type  of.  Compressors  like
Scroll, Reciprocating & Screw.

Skilled in installation, operation, repair and maintenance
of electronic systems and equipment.

Ensuring smooth and breakdown free operations of plant.

Able to check all safety and protection systems of HVAC.

Can do all mechanical job of HVAC.

Knowledge of maintenance of the Air Handling Units(AHU)
and Fan Coil Unit.

Knowledge of Building Management Systems (BMS) a unit



electronic components. 

Responsible for fixing circuit boards at component level.

Ability to understand new systems and its applications.
